easy.question: What planet is closest to the sun? 1)Venus 2)Mercury 3)Mars

medium.question: What is the square root of 81? 1)7 2)8 3)9

hard.question: Value of pi to 3 decimal places? 1)3.141 2)3.142 3)3.143
